      • bulkChangeMemberBroker

        public BulkMemberActionResultVO bulkChangeMemberBroker(FullTextMemberQuery query,
                                              Member newBroker,
                                              boolean suspendCommission,
                                              java.lang.String comments)
        Description copied from interface: BrokeringService
        Changes the broker of all members returned by the query. For members that already has such broker, nothing is done
        Specified by:
        bulkChangeMemberBroker in interface BrokeringService

      • changeBroker

        public Brokering changeBroker(ChangeBrokerDTO dto)
        Description copied from interface: BrokeringService
        Changes de broker of the specified member. Should generate a BrokerRemark to keep track of this change.
        Specified by:
        changeBroker in interface BrokeringService
        Parameters:
        dto - The new brokering data
        Returns:
        The result brokering. It may be:
        • The current open brokering if just suspending commission (the old and new brokers are the same and suspendCommission == true)
        • The new brokering if there's a new broker
        • null if the new broker is null
